title: Phone pixel 3a freezes and had unsuccessful try for reboot
content:
After probably some updates my phone become slower and had camera orientation and slow problems.
After seeing youtube freez  i decided to restart device. But - it took around 50 minuts and came with error massages - but i chose variant to try again and this is helped.
Maybe it will help somebody! Enjoy!
(Error on russian means - restart try is failed -  you have 2 choses - try again or reset settings)
